dc_title_s: Rebel line of works at Blakely captured by the Army of West Miss., April 9, 1865 position & approaches by the Union forces.
dc_creator_sm: United States. Army. Corps of Engineers.
dc_description_s: Union positions are colored blue, and Confederate works are red. Includes roads, vegetation, drainage, and relief by hachures.  Description derived from published bibliography.|26 x 38 centimeters|Scale 1:14,400|General Map Collection
